snippet: McCORMICK--Edward J.,of Remsenburg, NY, formerly of New York City, died on January 11, 2016. He was 80 years old. He was a graduate of St. Peter's University and New York University School of Law. He is survived by his wife Mary, his four children, and eight grandchildren. Funeral Mass January 15th, 11am, Immaculate Conception Church, Westhampton Beach, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: McCORMICK--Edward J.,of Remsenburg, NY, formerly of New York City, died on January 11, 2016. He was 80 years old. He was a graduate of St. Peter's University and New York University School of Law. He is survived by his wife Mary, his four children, and eight grandchildren. Funeral Mass January 15th, 11am, Immaculate Conception Church, Westhampton Beach, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCORMICK, EDWARD J.
